data.title: Sarath Ratanavadi â€“ Who's Who Thailand
data.text:
Thailand energy business tycoon, Richest Thai in 2022

Place of Birth: Bangkok

Date of Birth: Fri Jul 12, 1963

Family Background:

Born to General Thavorn and Prathum Ratanavadi (maiden family name Phoonsiriwong). Siblings: Sanit, elder brother and Sarit younger brother.

Education:

High-School: Vajiravudh College

B.A. Engineering (Civil Engineering), Chulalongkorn University

M.A. Science in Engineering Management,

University of Southern California, USA

Career:

1994-2016 Director and President, Gulf Electric Public Company Limited

2008-17 President, Gulf JP Company Limited

2011-17 Director and Chief Executive Officer, Gulf Energy Development Company Limited

2008-20 Director, Gulf JP Company Limited

2018-20 Director, Gulf Energy International Company Limited

2021-present Director and Vice Chairman of the Board, Intouch Holdings Public Company Limited

Honors:

2008-17 Board Vice Chairman, NIST International School Foundation

Marital Status:

Married to Nalinee (maiden family name: Tantisoonthorn) with 2 sons, Saris and Sitmon
